query:
UPDATE user_progress up
SET up.status = 'completed', up.completedAt = NOW()
WHERE up.userId = 7 AND up.courseId = 30002
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM question_progress qp 
    WHERE qp.userId = 7 AND qp.topicId = up.topicId 
      AND qp.firstAttemptStatus IN ('correct', 'incorrect')
  );
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3wc5j91T7XwfNX4.406ada0c06a9 --database RXc4pG5Wbo6eGZhnWSXpwa --execute UPDATE user_progress up
SET up.status = 'completed', up.completedAt = NOW()
WHERE up.userId = 7 AND up.courseId = 30002
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM question_progress qp 
    WHERE qp.userId = 7 AND qp.topicId = up.topicId 
      AND qp.firstAttemptStatus IN ('correct', 'incorrect')
  );
